message.content:
Tracing the relationships through the chain reveals that Kayla is an ancestor of Matthew. Here’s a simplified overview:

• We know from (9) “Ronald is Kayla’s descendant” that Kayla is an ancestor of Ronald.
• Following further links in the chain:
  Kayla → Ronald (9)
  Ronald → Angela (62)
  Angela → Janice (5)
  Janice → Eric (58)
  Eric → Jose (21)
  Jose → Amber (54)
  Amber → Christopher (57)
  Christopher → Emily (23)
  Emily → Eugene (63)
  Eugene → Isabella (30)
  Isabella → Shirley (14)
  Shirley → Ryan (51)
  Ryan → Robert (39)
  Robert → Billy (10)
  Billy → Daniel (31)
  Daniel → Kathryn (24)
  Kathryn → Julie (12)
  Julie → Brian (15)
  Brian → Juan (6)
  Juan → Michelle (41)
  Michelle → Grace (28)
  Grace → Jason (40)
  Jason → Marilyn (42)
  Marilyn → Martha (13)
  Martha → Diana (56 – note that “Diana is Martha’s descendant” means Martha is an ancestor of Diana, but following the chain in reverse gives Diana as a next link in the descending line)
  Diana → William (52)
  William → Maria (22)
  Maria → Ann (53)
  Ann → Andrea (44)
  Andrea → Adam (36)
  Adam → Joe (61)
  Joe → Aaron (4)
  Aaron → Jerry (3)
  Jerry → Dylan (16)
  Dylan → Gerald (38)
  Gerald → Anna (33)
  Anna → Gabriel (34)
  Gabriel → Betty (48)
  Betty → Jacob (49)
  Jacob → Sean (43)
  Sean → Scott (47)
  Scott → Benjamin (27)
  Benjamin → Hannah (29)
  Hannah → Danielle (59)
  Danielle → Michael (46)
  Michael → Debra (50)
  Debra → Kathleen (20)
  Kathleen → Sophia (19)
  Sophia → Brittany (17)
  Brittany → Nicole (45)
  Nicole → Wayne (18)
  Wayne → Katherine (2)
  Katherine → Judith (1)
  Judith → Christina (37)
  Christina → Larry (7)
  Larry → Harold (26)
  Harold → Jeremy (32)
  Jeremy → Alexander (60)
  Alexander → Paul (11)
  Paul → Gloria (55 “Gloria is Paul’s descendant” means Paul is the ancestor of Gloria)
  Gloria → Albert (25 “Gloria is Albert’s ancestor”)
  Albert → Sandra (8)
  Sandra → Matthew (35 “Matthew is Sandra’s descendant”)

Since the chain starting at Kayla leads all the way down to Matthew, we conclude that Kayla is an ancestor of Matthew.

The correct answer is therefore:
<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>
